  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Technical Sales Manager (Hospitality)",
  "description": "Cormart Nigeria Limited is a leading supplier of industrial chemicals and raw materials, serving key industries including construction, pharmaceuticals, food &amp; beverage, packaging, and cosmetics. Established in 1980, we proudly distribute world-class chemical brands while manufacturing our own line of premium industrial and consumer products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Sales Manager (Hospitality)
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	To Market Cormart Corygiene and hospitality products.
	&middot;Develop Concept of business development that would ensure the capture of new customers and business opportunities.
	&middot;To achieve the budget /Target for corygiene and hospitality products across the regions.
	&middot;To follow up for purchase order from customers.
	&middot;To monitor on time delivery of ordered materials.
	&middot;Coordinate marketing and sales activities of team members across the regions.
	&middot;To collect payment for the products supplied within agreed payment terms.
	&middot;To coordinate with customers on regular basis for the sample needed and give any technical help required to the customer
	&middot;To provide market information on regular basis
	&middot;Providing technical support to customers


Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Hospitality Management, or a related field
	4&ndash;6 years of sales experience in the hospitality industry (hotels, restaurants, or leisure services)
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
	Strong leadership and people management skills
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills
	Good understanding of hospitality operations and customer service standards
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career.cormart@clicktgi.net&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Technical Sales Manager (Hospitality) Job at Cormart Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Cormart Nigeria Limited is a leading supplier of industrial chemicals and raw materials, serving key industries including construction, pharmaceuticals, food & beverage, packaging, and cosmetics. Established in 1980, we proudly distribute world-class chemical brands while manufacturing our own line of premium industrial and consumer products.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Sales Manager (Hospitality)
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	To Market Cormart Corygiene and hospitality products.
	·Develop Concept of business development that would ensure the capture of new customers and business opportunities.
	·To achieve the budget /Target for corygiene and hospitality products across the regions.
	·To follow up for purchase order from customers.
	·To monitor on time delivery of ordered materials.
	·Coordinate marketing and sales activities of team members across the regions.
	·To collect payment for the products supplied within agreed payment terms.
	·To coordinate with customers on regular basis for the sample needed and give any technical help required to the customer
	·To provide market information on regular basis
	·Providing technical support to customers


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Hospitality Management, or a related field
	4–6 years of sales experience in the hospitality industry (hotels, restaurants, or leisure services)
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
	Strong leadership and people management skills
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills
	Good understanding of hospitality operations and customer service standards
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple priorities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career.cormart@clicktgi.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Legal Officer / Executive Assistant",
  "description": "Limeswood International Company Limited is a company with many years of industrial experience in software development, Integrated Security Services and IT distribution excellence. We pride ourselves in being the pioneer of all IT solutions in west Africa and employing individuals with innovations and creativities. With a vast amount of knowledge and experience, as well as devoted employees, our company is acting as the leading force through innovation, excellence, and providing clients with up-to-date, tailor made IT solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Officer / Executive Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are looking for a highly skilled Legal Officer / Executive Assistant to provide strategic legal support while assisting the CEO with executive tasks.
	The legal component of this role is the priority, and the ideal candidate will have proven experience working in a law firm or corporate legal department.
	You will manage contracts, compliance, and corporate legal matters, ensuring the company operates within the law. Alongside this, you will support the CEO with scheduling, correspondence, and other administrative duties.


Key Responsibilities
Legal Responsibilities (Primary Focus):


	Draft, review, and manage contracts, agreements, and other legal documents.
	Provide legal advice on corporate, regulatory, and compliance matters.
	Conduct legal research and prepare reports for management.
	Support dispute resolution and liaise with external law firms.
	Ensure all legal documents are accurate, up-to-date, and properly filed.
	Maintain strict confidentiality in handling sensitive legal matters.


Executive Assistant Responsibilities:


	Manage the CEO&rsquo;s calendar, meetings, and communications.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and executive documentation.
	Coordinate internal and external meetings, events, and travel logistics.
	Perform other administrative tasks to ensure smooth office operations.


Requirements


	LLB or equivalent law degree; a Master&rsquo;s or professional legal certification is a plus.
	Minimum 3 years of experience in a law firm or corporate legal department.
	Strong knowledge of corporate law, contract management, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and communication skills.
	Ability to prioritize tasks, work independently, and maintain confidentiality.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office and legal research tools.


Preferred Attributes:


	Proactive, detail-oriented, and highly professional.
	Strong interpersonal skills to liaise with management and external stakeholders.
	Ability to handle multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and cover letter to:&nbsp;Hr@limeswood.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-29",

Legal Officer / Executive Assistant Job at Limeswood International Company Limited




        
    

        
        Limeswood International Company Limited is a company with many years of industrial experience in software development, Integrated Security Services and IT distribution excellence. We pride ourselves in being the pioneer of all IT solutions in west Africa and employing individuals with innovations and creativities. With a vast amount of knowledge and experience, as well as devoted employees, our company is acting as the leading force through innovation, excellence, and providing clients with up-to-date, tailor made IT solutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Legal Officer / Executive Assistant

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



About the Role


	We are looking for a highly skilled Legal Officer / Executive Assistant to provide strategic legal support while assisting the CEO with executive tasks.
	The legal component of this role is the priority, and the ideal candidate will have proven experience working in a law firm or corporate legal department.
	You will manage contracts, compliance, and corporate legal matters, ensuring the company operates within the law. Alongside this, you will support the CEO with scheduling, correspondence, and other administrative duties.


Key Responsibilities
Legal Responsibilities (Primary Focus):


	Draft, review, and manage contracts, agreements, and other legal documents.
	Provide legal advice on corporate, regulatory, and compliance matters.
	Conduct legal research and prepare reports for management.
	Support dispute resolution and liaise with external law firms.
	Ensure all legal documents are accurate, up-to-date, and properly filed.
	Maintain strict confidentiality in handling sensitive legal matters.


Executive Assistant Responsibilities:


	Manage the CEO’s calendar, meetings, and communications.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and executive documentation.
	Coordinate internal and external meetings, events, and travel logistics.
	Perform other administrative tasks to ensure smooth office operations.


Requirements


	LLB or equivalent law degree; a Master’s or professional legal certification is a plus.
	Minimum 3 years of experience in a law firm or corporate legal department.
	Strong knowledge of corporate law, contract management, and regulatory compliance.
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and communication skills.
	Ability to prioritize tasks, work independently, and maintain confidentiality.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office and legal research tools.


Preferred Attributes:


	Proactive, detail-oriented, and highly professional.
	Strong interpersonal skills to liaise with management and external stakeholders.
	Ability to handle multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume and cover letter to: Hr@limeswood.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Electrical Technician",
  "description": "Perfection Motors, a subsidiary of the Lee Group of companies was established in partnership with FAW China. Perfection Motor&rsquo;s was given the sole rights to, assemble and market FAW heavy duty Trucks in Nigeria. Since our inception in 2013 we have made great strides in insuring that we will be ready to service our market by establishing our head office alongside a fully equipped workshop, Parts Department and not to mention an SKD assembly plant in Ikeja.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Technician
Job Location:&nbsp;Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Performing electronic diagnostics on cars and othervehicleto identify faults
	Repairing electrical and electronic faults in cars, trucks and motor vehicles, replacing damaged/faulty parts where necessary
	Performing checks and tests to verify the success of repair work
	Assembling and installing electrical and electronic systems in motor vehicles
	Preparing time and cost estimates for customers
	Performing routine revision and maintenance on motor vehicles
	Regular industry research to stay current withvehiclemanufacturers updates and new repair tools / products and techniques for current and future problem-solving and decision making.
	Quality control analysis; conducting tests and inspection of products, services / processes to evaluate quality and performance.
	Performs other duties as assigned.


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess First School Leaving Certificate (FSLC) with at least 3 years of work experience.
	Knowledge of English language (written and oral)
	Auto electrical and mechanical knowledge
	Experience repairing automobile air conditioning
	Knowledge of diagnostics tools for vehicle electrical and electronics
	Ability to read electrical and electronic schematics and circuit diagrams
	Ability to carry out / repair electrical wiring in a range of vehicles
	Strong manual skills and precision when carrying out repair and testing
	Organizational skills and ability to work as part of a team
	Problem-solving skills.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications and detailed CV (in MS Word and PDF) to:&nbsp;deborah.james@perfection-motor.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Electrical Technician Job at Perfection Motors




        
    

        
        Perfection Motors, a subsidiary of the Lee Group of companies was established in partnership with FAW China. Perfection Motor’s was given the sole rights to, assemble and market FAW heavy duty Trucks in Nigeria. Since our inception in 2013 we have made great strides in insuring that we will be ready to service our market by establishing our head office alongside a fully equipped workshop, Parts Department and not to mention an SKD assembly plant in Ikeja.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Technician
Job Location: Kano
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Performing electronic diagnostics on cars and othervehicleto identify faults
	Repairing electrical and electronic faults in cars, trucks and motor vehicles, replacing damaged/faulty parts where necessary
	Performing checks and tests to verify the success of repair work
	Assembling and installing electrical and electronic systems in motor vehicles
	Preparing time and cost estimates for customers
	Performing routine revision and maintenance on motor vehicles
	Regular industry research to stay current withvehiclemanufacturers updates and new repair tools / products and techniques for current and future problem-solving and decision making.
	Quality control analysis; conducting tests and inspection of products, services / processes to evaluate quality and performance.
	Performs other duties as assigned.


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess First School Leaving Certificate (FSLC) with at least 3 years of work experience.
	Knowledge of English language (written and oral)
	Auto electrical and mechanical knowledge
	Experience repairing automobile air conditioning
	Knowledge of diagnostics tools for vehicle electrical and electronics
	Ability to read electrical and electronic schematics and circuit diagrams
	Ability to carry out / repair electrical wiring in a range of vehicles
	Strong manual skills and precision when carrying out repair and testing
	Organizational skills and ability to work as part of a team
	Problem-solving skills.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications and detailed CV (in MS Word and PDF) to: deborah.james@perfection-motor.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

	Prepare correspondence, reports, and official documents

	Proficient in MS Word, Excel, and general office tools
	Good communication, organization, and confidentiality skills


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 per month.&nbsp;

Method of Application

School Secretary Job at FTB Talents




        
    

        
        FTB Talents is a recruitment and outsourcing firm that focuses on bringing you the right talents that fosters positivity and productivity to your business or organisation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: School Secretary
Job Location: Anambra

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage front-office and general administrative duties
	Maintain accurate student, staff, and school records
	Assist with basic accounting tasks, including:
	Recording income and expenses
	Fee schedules and payment tracking
	Supporting payroll and petty cash management
	Prepare correspondence, reports, and official documents
	Support the Vice Principal (Administration) and school management
	Handle inquiries from parents and visitors professionally


Requirements


	HND / B.Sc in Administration, Accounting, or related fields.
	3–5 years of experience as an Administrative Secretary or Office Administrator
	Practical accounting experience (school accounting experience is an added advantage)
	Strong knowledge of record keeping, basic bookkeeping, and financial documentation
	Proficient in MS Word, Excel, and general office tools
	Good communication, organization, and confidentiality skills


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ftbtalents@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Analyst",
  "description": "Netcom has been Nigeria&rsquo;s leading Internet Service Provider since 2004, staying ahead of the competition with cutting edge platforms in VSAT, WIMAX, Radio, and Fiber technology. Now, a pioneer in Business Transformation Solutions, we empower organizations to lead their market space by keeping pace with the rapid changes in IT innovations, ensuring relevance to specific business initiatives required to maximize revenue generation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Analyst

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing and understanding the business needs and requirements of clients or internal stakeholders and translating them into effective technology solutions.
	You will play a critical role in understanding business requirements, designing effective solutions, facilitating communication between stakeholders, and ensuring the successful implementation of technology solutions to meet the needs of clients or internal teams.


Key Duties &amp; Responsibilities


	Requirement Gathering: Respond to customer requests for proposals received through Business Development Department, develop technical solution designs and bills of materials for cost-effective solutions. Work closely with clients and internal teams (subject matter experts) to elicit, analyze, and document business requirements and objectives. Gather and prioritize customer requirements and other market insights to define the future of Netcom products and services and to recommend new product lines.
	Business Process Analysis: Evaluate existing business processes, workflows, and systems to identify areas for improvement and optimization. Analyze process inefficiencies and suggest solutions to enhance productivity and efficiency.
	Solution Design: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and design innovative technology solutions that align with business requirements. Create functional specifications and communicate the proposed solution effectively. Achieve product and service productivity, profitability, and growth targets.
	Stakeholder Communication: Provide business support for the company&#39;s portfolio of products and services and effectively communicate the value proposition of offered solutions.
	Requirements Documentation: Prepare detailed documentation of business requirements, use cases, functional specifications, and system design specifications. This documentation serves as a reference for implementation teams and ensures clarity and accuracy in the implementation process.
	Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies relevant to the solutions hub. Identify opportunities for process improvement, automation, and optimization within the hub and propose innovative ideas to enhance business operations. Develop thorough knowledge of technology relating to our products/services in network, storage, servers, cloud, and security solutions.


Requirements &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in a Technology or business related discipline
	2-3 years of job experience in the information technology or related technical service provider
	A record of achievement and business solution expertise in a comparable Business Analysis role.
	Product sales certification, engineering design credentials, business analysis certification or equivalent technical sales credentials for OEM solutions.
	Demonstrated success defining, launching, and managing product lines.


Essential Skills:


	Ability and capability to understand customer requirements and determine the best solutions.
	Demonstrate understanding of systems administration and performance tuning of application/software &ndash; virtualization, containerization, automation software, Cloud architecture, UNIX/Linux based environments, etc.
	Demonstrate understanding of network design and implementation in IP networks is a must &ndash; switches, routers, firewalls, bandwidth managers, IP telephony systems, wireless network, etc.
	Ability to work as a motivated self-driven team player in coordination with capability owners and Account Managers for standard solutions and with HOD&rsquo;s and Management for non-standard and new products and services solutions.
	Commitment to developing and maintaining long-term customer relationships.
	Excellent written, verbal and presentation communication skills.


Desirable Skills / knowledge / Traits:


	Commercial and customer focus
	Analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Adaptability and learning agility
	Project Management
	Ability to motivate and drive cross-functional teams without formal authority.
	Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking.
	Ability to work under pressure.
	Willing to perform work or support outside office hours if required.
",
  "datePosted": "2026-01-12",
  "validThrough": "2026-02-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Netcom Africa"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "192868"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Business Analyst Job at Netcom Africa




        
    

        
        Netcom has been Nigeria’s leading Internet Service Provider since 2004, staying ahead of the competition with cutting edge platforms in VSAT, WIMAX, Radio, and Fiber technology. Now, a pioneer in Business Transformation Solutions, we empower organizations to lead their market space by keeping pace with the rapid changes in IT innovations, ensuring relevance to specific business initiatives required to maximize revenue generation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Analyst

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	The Business Analyst will be responsible for analyzing and understanding the business needs and requirements of clients or internal stakeholders and translating them into effective technology solutions.
	You will play a critical role in understanding business requirements, designing effective solutions, facilitating communication between stakeholders, and ensuring the successful implementation of technology solutions to meet the needs of clients or internal teams.


Key Duties & Responsibilities


	Requirement Gathering: Respond to customer requests for proposals received through Business Development Department, develop technical solution designs and bills of materials for cost-effective solutions. Work closely with clients and internal teams (subject matter experts) to elicit, analyze, and document business requirements and objectives. Gather and prioritize customer requirements and other market insights to define the future of Netcom products and services and to recommend new product lines.
	Business Process Analysis: Evaluate existing business processes, workflows, and systems to identify areas for improvement and optimization. Analyze process inefficiencies and suggest solutions to enhance productivity and efficiency.
	Solution Design: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and design innovative technology solutions that align with business requirements. Create functional specifications and communicate the proposed solution effectively. Achieve product and service productivity, profitability, and growth targets.
	Stakeholder Communication: Provide business support for the company's portfolio of products and services and effectively communicate the value proposition of offered solutions.
	Requirements Documentation: Prepare detailed documentation of business requirements, use cases, functional specifications, and system design specifications. This documentation serves as a reference for implementation teams and ensures clarity and accuracy in the implementation process.
	Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies relevant to the solutions hub. Identify opportunities for process improvement, automation, and optimization within the hub and propose innovative ideas to enhance business operations. Develop thorough knowledge of technology relating to our products/services in network, storage, servers, cloud, and security solutions.


Requirements & Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in a Technology or business related discipline
	2-3 years of job experience in the information technology or related technical service provider
	A record of achievement and business solution expertise in a comparable Business Analysis role.
	Product sales certification, engineering design credentials, business analysis certification or equivalent technical sales credentials for OEM solutions.
	Demonstrated success defining, launching, and managing product lines.


Essential Skills:


	Ability and capability to understand customer requirements and determine the best solutions.
	Demonstrate understanding of systems administration and performance tuning of application/software – virtualization, containerization, automation software, Cloud architecture, UNIX/Linux based environments, etc.
	Demonstrate understanding of network design and implementation in IP networks is a must – switches, routers, firewalls, bandwidth managers, IP telephony systems, wireless network, etc.
	Ability to work as a motivated self-driven team player in coordination with capability owners and Account Managers for standard solutions and with HOD’s and Management for non-standard and new products and services solutions.
	Commitment to developing and maintaining long-term customer relationships.
	Excellent written, verbal and presentation communication skills.


Desirable Skills / knowledge / Traits:


	Commercial and customer focus
	Analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Adaptability and learning agility
	Project Management
	Ability to motivate and drive cross-functional teams without formal authority.
	Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking.
	Ability to work under pressure.
	Willing to perform work or support outside office hours if required.
